items.name: Bruschetta al Pomodoro
items.description: Toasted rustic bread topped with marinated cherry tomatoes, garlic, and fresh basil.

items.name: Calamari Fritti
items.description: Crispy fried squid rings served with a spicy marinara dipping sauce and lemon.

items.name: Carpaccio di Manzo
items.description: Thinly sliced raw beef tenderloin, arugula, shaved parmesan, capers, and truffle oil.

items.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
items.description: Classic Roman dish with guanciale, egg yolk, pecorino romano, and black pepper.

items.name: Pappardelle al Cinghiale
items.description: Wide ribbon pasta with slow-braised wild boar ragù and aged parmesan.

items.name: Ravioli Ricotta e Spinaci
items.description: Handmade pasta filled with ricotta and spinach, served in a sage butter sauce.

items.name: Bistecca alla Fiorentina
items.description: Grilled T-bone steak (for two) seasoned simply with olive oil and rosemary.

items.name: Branzino al Forno
items.description: Whole roasted Mediterranean seabass with lemon, herbs, and fingerling potatoes.

items.name: Pollo al Limone
items.description: Pan-seared chicken breast in a white wine and lemon-caper sauce.

items.name: Tiramisù Classico
items.description: Espresso-soaked ladyfingers layered with mascarpone cream.

items.name: Panna Cotta alla Vaniglia
items.description: Vanilla bean panna cotta with an overriding mixed berry compote.

items.name: Cannoli Siciliani
items.description: Crispy pastry shells filled with sweet ricotta and chocolate chips.

items.name: Aperol Spritz
items.description: Aperol, Prosecco, and a splash of soda water, garnished with orange.

items.name: Negroni
items.description: Equal parts gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth.

items.name: Acqua Panna / San Pellegrino
items.description: Still or sparkling Italian mineral water (1L).
